flesh-eater-courts.name: Flesh Eater Courts
flesh-eater-courts.description: Path to Glory faction pack for Flesh Eater Courts

enhancements.name: Charnel Vestments
enhancements.description: Strips of flayed skin and crudely stitched sinew form a gruesome parody of priestly robes. If this unit is not a Priest, it has Priest (1). If this unit is already a Priest, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

enhancements.name: The Grim Garland
enhancements.description: Formed from the skulls of kings and emperors, this morbid wreath evokes fear in all who see it. Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

enhancements.name: Heart of the Gargant
enhancements.description: This slab of muscle still beats with the strength of the gargant from which it was torn, and each bite of it grants colossal might. Once per battle in combat: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons for the rest of the turn. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

pathAbilities.name: Cruel Taskmaster
pathAbilities.description: The warriors under this courtier's command instantly obey their summons. Each time a friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the 'Rally' command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

pathAbilities.name: Stronger in Madness
pathAbilities.description: The Boon of Ushoran has rendered this warrior's physical form near-indestructible. Add 2 to this unit's Health characteristic. In addition, while this unit has 6 noble deeds points, it has Ward (5+).

pathAbilities.name: Savage Beyond Reason
pathAbilities.description: The fury of battle drives this general into an intense rage. While this unit has fewer than 6 noble deeds points, its melee weapons have Crit (2 Hits). While it has 6 noble deeds points, its melee weapons have Crit (Mortal).

battleFormations.name: Knightly Echelon
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn - A Hunger for Glory: Seeking to rise up the depraved hierarchy of their kind, champions of the courts will attempt to outdo one another with acts of derring-do, such as launching bold and bloody raids deep into enemy territory. Give 1 noble deeds point to each friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero wholly outside friendly territory.

battleFormations.name: Lords of the Manor
battleFormations.description: Passive - Raise the Banners: In the dominating presence of their royal masters, courtiers of every rank call forth their minions in ever greater numbers. Each time a friendly unit uses an ability that returns any slain models to a friendly Serfs or Knights unit, add 1 to the number of slain models returned to that unit.

battleFormations.name: The Royal Hunt
battleFormations.description: Passive - Gore-Splattered Hunters: The mordants of the Ghoul Patrols scuttle through their perceived kingdoms in deranged warbands, ready to assail the enemy in coordinated strikes. When players are alternating picking units to use a Fight ability, when it is your turn to pick a unit, you can pick 2 Crypt Ghouls units instead of 1. Neither unit can have Strike-last. Resolve the second Fight ability immediately after the first.

battleFormations.name: Royal Menagerie
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase - Meat for the Beast: In battle, Flesh-eater monarchs often toss their pet monstrosities choice cuts of flesh, granting them a burst of strength and ferocity. Pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Monster. Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

battleFormations.name: Impassioned Serfs
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

battleFormations.name: Questing Courtiers
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

spells.name: Deranged Transformation
spells.description: The spellcaster causes the limbs of a nearby pack to bulge and lengthen, allowing the creatures to charge forwards at a furious pace and imbuing them with greater strength. Pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry or Cavalry unit wholly within 12" of the caster. Until the start of your next turn: Add 2" to the target's Move characteristic and add 1 to wound rolls for the target's combat attacks.

spells.name: Miasma of Madness
spells.description: The wizard calls forth a sanity-warping mist to engulf the foe. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster. Roll 7 dice and apply effects: Ravaged Mind (2+ same values = 1 mortal damage), Gory Visions (3+ same values = subtract 1 from hit rolls), Drooling Stupor (4+ same values = also subtract 1 from wound rolls).

spells.name: Charnel Feast
spells.description: The caster draws out the life essence of nearby foes and uses it to heal the injured warriors of the court. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster. Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, you can pick a friendly Flesh-eater Courts Infantry unit within 6" of the target. For each damage point allocated to the target by this ability, you can return 1 slain model to that friendly unit.

prayers.name: Blessed Feast
prayers.description: The priest blesses his followers' next meal to bring health and happiness to those who partake. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the chanter. Until the start of your next turn, each time a model in the target unit is slain, Heal (1) a friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit in combat with the target. If the chanting roll was 10+, Heal (D3) that friendly unit instead.

prayers.name: The Summerking's Favour
prayers.description: The priest delivers a blistering sermon lionising the deeds of a courtly champion, marking them out as a saint in their followers' eyes. Pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts Hero wholly within 18" of the chanter. Until the start of your next turn, each time an enemy model is slain by a combat attack made by the target, give the target 1 additional noble deeds point after the Fight ability has been resolved. If the chanting roll was 10+, give all friendly Flesh-eater Courts Heroes wholly within 18" of the target 1 additional noble deeds point instead.

prayers.name: Charnel Conviction
prayers.description: Anointed with libations by their priest, ghouls believe themselves to be invincible warriors of faith. Pick a visible friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit wholly within 18" of the chanter. Until the start of your next turn, the target has Ward (5+). If the chanting roll was 10+, pick another friendly Flesh-eater Courts unit wholly within 18" of the target. That unit also has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

manifestations.name: Summon Chalice of Ushoran
manifestations.description: The wizard conjures forth a manifestation of the sacred cup held by Ushoran. This bone-wrought goblet is continually filled with the blood of those slain in its presence. Set up a Chalice of Ushoran wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

manifestations.name: Summon Cadaverous Barricade
manifestations.description: With a word of command, the corpses of those who once served Ushoran rise up from the grave, dragging with them the detritus of a forgotten civilisation and clawing at the living with lifeless hands. Set up a Cadaverous Barricade wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

manifestations.name: Summon Corpsemare Stampede
manifestations.description: Imbued with grisly vigour by the insane magics of the abhorrants, the undead beasts of a Corpsemare Stampede burst from the blood-soaked ground to trample across the battlefield with reckless abandon. Set up a Corpsemare Stampede wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

ossiarch-bonereapers.name: Ossiarch Bonereapers
ossiarch-bonereapers.description: Path to Glory faction pack for Ossiarch Bonereapers

enhancements.name: Marrowpact
enhancements.description: The glyphs borne to war by this champion bind those who view them in arcane pacts that siphon the energy from their bone marrow. For the rest of the turn, if the unmodified hit roll for a combat attack that targets this unit is 1-2, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

enhancements.name: Lode of Saturation
enhancements.description: This ingot of nadirite-iron alloy, when pressed against a bone construct, renders its structure nigh invulnerable. This unit has Ward (5+).

enhancements.name: Helm of Tyranny
enhancements.description: This helm radiates the oppressive will of the wearer, filling nearby foes with supernatural dread. Subtract 2 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

pathAbilities.name: Diversionary Tactics
pathAbilities.description: Infused with especially cunning souls, this hero uses all manner of snares and ruses to hinder a foe's advance. Subtract 2 from charge rolls for enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

pathAbilities.name: Aura of Sterility
pathAbilities.description: Ending magics shroud this hero, sapping the force from arrows and other projectiles. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly Ossiarch Bonereapers units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

pathAbilities.name: Mighty Archaeossian
pathAbilities.description: The fossilised bone from which this hero is formed is supernaturally hard. If the unmodified hit roll for an attack that targets this unit is 1-3, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

battleFormations.name: Mortisan Council
battleFormations.description: Passive - Necrotic Symphony: Each Mortisan thrives in the presence of their fellow craftsmen, their arcane might spiralling as the collective magnifies their individual potency. Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly Ossiarch Bonereapers Infantry Wizards.

battleFormations.name: Mortek Ballistari
battleFormations.description: Your Shooting Phase - Crawling Barrage: Ossiarch artillery is best utilised en masse, unleashing their necrotic payload from a secure position behind the Mortek ranks. Pick up to 3 friendly Mortek Crawler units that are wholly within friendly territory and that have not used a Move ability this turn. Add 1 to hit rolls for each target's shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleFormations.name: Kavalos Lance
battleFormations.description: Once Per Battle (Army), Deployment Phase - Swift as Death: Kavalos formations dominate the battlefield with their sheer speed, seeking out the enemy's weakest point before sending a deadly charge crashing home. Pick up to 3 friendly Ossiarch Bonereapers Cavalry units. Each target can move 6" but cannot end that move in combat.

battleFormations.name: Mortek Phalanx
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase - Send in the Reserve: The Mortek Guard are deployed in deep ranks, with strategic reserves ready to enter the fray whenever the cohesion of the battleline is threatened. Pick a friendly Mortek Guard unit that has been destroyed. Roll a dice. On a 5+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleFormations.name: Tithe Guards
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

battleFormations.name: Hekatos Drillmasters
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

spells.name: Empower Nadirite Weapons
spells.description: The caster imbues nadirite weapons with deadly power. Pick a visible friendly Ossiarch Bonereapers unit within 12" of the caster. The target's combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Drain Vitality
spells.description: This cursed spell saps a foe's strength, leaving them weak and vulnerable. Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of the caster. Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks and subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.

spells.name: Shard Storm
spells.description: The caster conjures forth a great cloud of bone-shards and hurls them at the foe. Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster. Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

manifestations.name: Summon Soulstealer Carrion
manifestations.description: Soaring from its caster's spread fingertips, the Soulstealer Carrion takes wing above the battlefield. Set up a Soulstealer Carrion wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestations.name: Summon Nightmare Predator
manifestations.description: The Nightmare Predator is a looming conjuration of Shyishan magic that takes the form of a disturbing terror. Set up a Nightmare Predator wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestations.name: Summon Bone-tithe Shrieker
manifestations.description: The caster conjures a four-headed, all-seeing monstrosity to hunt down those who would escape the Ossiarch tithe. Set up a Bone-tithe Shrieker wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

slaves-to-darkness.name: Slaves to Darkness
slaves-to-darkness.description: Path to Glory faction pack for Slaves to Darkness

enhancements.name: Infernal Puppet
enhancements.description: As it dances upon the aetheric winds, this eldritch marionette violently disrupts the spellcraft of enemy mages. Once per battle: Pick a visible enemy Wizard within 24" of this unit. For the rest of the turn, each time the target is picked to use a Spell ability, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target as a reaction.

enhancements.name: The Conqueror's Crown
enhancements.description: This blasphemous diadem grants the bearer dominion over the minds of lesser mortals. Subtract 5 from the control scores of enemy Infantry units while they are in combat with this unit.

enhancements.name: Realmwarper's Twist-Rune
enhancements.description: One who bears this cursed rune can bind warped landscapes to their will. Once per battle: Pick a terrain feature within 12" of this unit. If the target does not have the 'Obscuring' terrain ability, it gains that ability until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a dice for each model within 1" of the target. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on that model's unit.

pathAbilities.name: Favoured of the Pantheon
pathAbilities.description: The gods watch this warlord's deeds particularly closely. This unit can use the 'Eye of the Gods' ability as if it were the end of the turn and it had destroyed an enemy unit this turn.

pathAbilities.name: Radiance of Dark Glory
pathAbilities.description: In the presence of this champion, the mutative energies of Chaos can seal shut even the most grievous of wounds. Pick each damaged friendly unit wholly within 12" of this unit. Roll a dice for each. On a 3+, Heal (1) the target. Heal (3) instead if it is a Monster.

pathAbilities.name: Deathmonger
pathAbilities.description: Feared across the realms, this hero leaves naught in their wake but a trail of sun-bleached bones. Once per battle: This unit can use 2 Fight abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, this unit has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

battleFormations.name: Legion of Chaos
battleFormations.description: Passive - United in Darkness: The myriad forces of Chaos march to war under a common cause, led by warlords who have put aside their rivalries in the name of laying waste to the lands of a shared foe. While there is at least 1 friendly Warriors of Chaos Hero and 1 other friendly Daemon Hero or Darkoath Hero on the battlefield, add 2 to the control scores of friendly Slaves to Darkness units while they are contesting an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory.

battleFormations.name: Godswrath Warband
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn - Ironclad Onslaught: When a Chaos horde is on the march, the realms tremble. Hundreds of heavily armoured warriors desecrate all in their path as they roar oaths to the Dark Pantheon. Pick an objective that is contested by any friendly units. Place a defiled token next to the target objective. Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit contesting an objective that has a defiled token. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

battleFormations.name: Despoilers
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for a friendly Daemon Prince unit - Feral Ruin: A Daemon Prince's unholy radiance draws to them the most savage of chaotic creatures, abominations against nature that hunger to spill blood. Pick a friendly non-Hero Slaves to Darkness Monster or Beast unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is wholly within 12" of this unit. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved.

battleFormations.name: Darkoath Horde
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase - Rally the Tribes: One of the horde's commanders looses a terrifying battle cry, calling more of their blade-sworn warriors to their side. If there is a friendly Darkoath Hero on the battlefield, pick a friendly non-Hero non-Unique Darkoath unit that has been destroyed. Roll a dice. On a 3+, set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) on the battlefield, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 3" from all enemy units.

battleFormations.name: Chaos Horde
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

battleFormations.name: Champions of Chaos
battleFormations.description: From Scourge of Ghyran

spells.name: Spite-Tongue Curse
spells.description: Uttering the foul syllables of the Dark Tongue until blood pours from their mouth, the caster beseeches the Chaos Gods to destroy their enemies – though such pacts carry with them a terrible cost. Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of the caster. If the casting attempt is unsuccessful or if the spell is unbound, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster. Effect: Inflict 3 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Binding Damnation
spells.description: At the caster's urging, tendrils of raw Chaos burst from the tortured ground, entwining the limbs of their enemies and rendering them easy prey. Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of the caster. The target has Strike-last until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Daemonic Speed
spells.description: Infernal winds blow at the back of these hordes, speeding them into battle against the enemies of the gods. Pick a visible friendly Slaves to Darkness unit wholly within 12" of the caster. For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

manifestations.name: Summon Darkfire Daemonrift
manifestations.description: Darkfire Daemonrifts are eldritch portals torn ajar by dark incantations. Once the veil has been sundered, raw magic seeping from the Realm of Chaos forms an opening for the horrors beyond to vent their spite, widened and empowered by spellcraft that draws upon the essence of Chaos. Set up a Darkfire Daemonrift wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestations.name: Summon Eightfold Doom-Sigil
manifestations.description: Eightfold Doom-Sigils are icons of Chaos in all its glory, blazing symbols of pure ruin. To fall in the presence of such a sorcerous construct is to be damned, for these lingering spells hungrily suck souls into the Realm of Chaos for the gods to feast upon. Set up an Eightfold Doom-Sigil wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

manifestations.name: Summon Realmscourge Rupture
manifestations.description: Realmscourge Ruptures are not subtle weapons. When the necessary magical power has been channelled and released by a tribal shaman, the land itself writhes in the grip of Chaos, sharpened spikes surging forth like an accursed tidal wave to overwhelm anything in their path. Set up a Realmscourge Rupture wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

stormcast-eternals.name: Stormcast Eternals
stormcast-eternals.description: Path to Glory faction pack for Stormcast Eternals

enhancements.name: Null Pendant
enhancements.description: This dark amulet holds magic within that can sap the resolve of the enemy. Once per battle, end of any turn: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target. Subtract 5 from the target's control score for the rest of the turn.

enhancements.name: Quicksilver Draught
enhancements.description: This potion lends uncanny speed to the one who imbibes it. Once per battle, any combat phase: This unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

enhancements.name: Mirrorshield
enhancements.description: This shield reflects the sun's rays in questing beams that seek out the eyes of enemy marksmen. This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 9" of it.

pathAbilities.name: Staunch Defender
pathAbilities.description: To contest the sacred grounds of Sigmar is to invoke the almighty power of Azyr. While this unit is contesting an objective in friendly territory, add 3 to the control scores of all friendly Stormcast Eternals units contesting that objective.

pathAbilities.name: Envoy of the Heavens
pathAbilities.description: When a Stormcast Eternal is laid low, the light that carries the warrior's soul back to Azyr invigorates those who fight on. If a friendly unit was destroyed in the previous turn, pick a visible friendly Stormcast Eternals unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target. The target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

pathAbilities.name: Shock and Awe
pathAbilities.description: When this general and their Stormcasts take to the field, their shining visage strikes fear into the foe. Each time a friendly Stormcast Eternals unit is set up wholly within 12" of this unit using the 'Scions of the Storm' ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the battle round.

battleFormations.name: Sentinels of the Bleak Citadels
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase - Ancient Aura: Storm-charged energy ebbs and flows around the warriors of the Ruination chamber, surrounding them in a scouring aura of power. Finding purchase with a weapon on these ancient heroes can be a difficult task for even the mightiest of mortal foes. Pick a friendly Ruination Chamber unit. That unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the turn.

battleFormations.name: Thunderhead Host
battleFormations.description: Passive - Synchronised Strikes: The core of a Thunderhead Host is often made up of fighters from the Warrior chambers; having trained relentlessly with the sworn brethren of their Stormhost, they operate like a well-oiled cogfort. Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Warrior Chamber units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly non-Hero Stormcast Eternals units that do not have the Warrior Chamber keyword.

battleFormations.name: Vanguard Wing
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase - Peerless Manoeuvres: These warriors are the precision weapon of the God-King, skilled at manipulating a battlefield in their favour by feinting from view and reappearing where they are needed most. Pick a friendly Vanguard Chamber unit that is not in combat. Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleFormations.name: Lightning Echelon
battleFormations.description: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase - Oncoming Storm: First to the fight, the Lightning Echelon is akin to a spear-thrust into the heart of the enemy. Deployed only in times of great need, they smash into the foe's vanguard with the force of an oncoming tempest. Pick a friendly Extremis Chamber unit that charged this turn. Roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit has Strike-first for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Lightning Blast
spells.description: The wizard releases pent-up storm energy into the foe. Pick the closest visible enemy unit to the caster that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn. Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

spells.name: Thundershock
spells.description: The wizard unleashes the power of Sigmar's storm as a roiling wave of pure force. Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of the caster. Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target's attacks until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Starfall
spells.description: Gazing towards the heavens, the wizard hurls meteoric rain into the enemy's path. Pick a visible enemy Infantry or Cavalry unit within 18" of the caster. Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

prayers.name: Healing Storm
prayers.description: The priest calls down cleansing bolts from the sky, their invigorating energies closing even the most grievous wounds. Pick a visible friendly Stormcast Eternals unit wholly within 12" of the chanter. Heal (D3) the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, Heal (D3) each visible friendly Stormcast Eternals unit wholly within 12" of the chanter instead.

prayers.name: Bless Weapons
prayers.description: The priest imbues weapons of those nearby with the pure essence of the storm. Pick a visible friendly Stormcast Eternals Infantry unit wholly within 12" of the chanter. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target's melee weapons until the start of your next turn. If the chanting roll was 12+, this ability affects all visible friendly Stormcast Eternals units wholly within 12" of the chanter.

prayers.name: Translocation
prayers.description: The priest summons bolts of lightning to transport nearby warriors across the battlefield. Pick a visible friendly Stormcast Eternals unit wholly within 12" of the chanter. Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the battle round.

manifestations.name: Summon Dais Arcanum
manifestations.description: The wizard calls down a single bolt of lightning to strike the ground at their feet, leaving behind a perfect sigmarite disc for a chosen Stormcast to mount and be carried into the air. Pick a friendly Stormcast Eternals Infantry Hero that does not have Fly and is wholly within 12" of the caster. Set up a Dais Arcanum within ½" of the target, visible to the caster and not in combat. Then, remove the target from the battlefield and place it on the platform of that Dais Arcanum.

manifestations.name: Summon Celestian Vortex
manifestations.description: The wizard casts a pair of ensorcelled hammers into the air, which begin to spin. As the vortex gets more intense, the hammers multiply to form a maelstrom of skull-crushing force. Set up a Celestian Vortex wholly within 18" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

manifestations.name: Summon Everblaze Comet
manifestations.description: Reaching an arm to the heavens, the wizard calls down a pure comet of Azyrite energy that crashes into the foe's ranks with devastating effect. Set up an Everblaze Comet wholly within 18" of the caster.
